p: The CR K. pneumoniae strain was procured from Government Head Quarters Hospital, Tiruchirappalli, Tamil Nadu, India, which cause urinary tract infections. The carbapenemase production of selected CR K. pneumoniae strain was confirmed by Nitro-Carba test, followed by previous report of Teethaisong et al., (2019). All the chemicals, reagents, plates and antibiotic discs of this study was procured from Hi-Media Laboratories, Mumbai, India.
